issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Steps to reproduce:*
1. Install KS on iOS 8 device.
2. Navigate to Controls>TextField>ToolBar
3.Click on a textfield that says "Focus to see keyboard w/toolbar"
Keyboard with toolbar appear.
4.Press any toolbar's icon (Camera) on a Toolbar


{color:red}*Actual Result:*{color}
Get an alert message "Toolbar. You clicked camera!"
But Keyboard moves down leaving its toolbar behind on the bottom of the screen 
Refer to screenShot attached.

{color:green}*Expected Result:*{color}
Should get a message "Toolbar. You clicked camera!"
Keyboard must not get hidden.

Note: Keyboard remains appear on screen on iOS7
fields.summary: iOS8: Keyboard with toolbar becomes hidden when clicking its toolbar icon
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio:3.3.0.201407111535
Sdk:3.3.0.GA
alloy:1.4.0
titanium:3.3.0
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1
acs:1.0.15
npm:1.3.2
OS:Maverick(10.9.3)
Device: iPhone5S(v8.0), Ipad Air(v8.0)
xcode: Xcode6Beta4

comments.body:
Similar issue also occur while executing.

*Steps to reproduce:*
1. Install KS on iOS 8 device.
2. Navigate to Controls>TextField>Buttons on Textfields
3.Click on a textfield.
Keyboard appears.
4.Press any button(left icon) on Textfield


{color:green}*Expected Result:*{color}
Should get a message "Text field. You clicked the left button" 
Keyboard must not get hidden.

{color:red}*Actual Result:*{color}
Get an alert message  "Text field. You clicked the left button" 
But Keyboard hides. 
After that unable to focus the keyboard back again.

Was able to reproduce this issue with Xcode 6 beta 4 , seems to have resolved on its own in Xcode 6 beta 5. 

Tested on Ipad 4g running iOS 8 beta 5, iPad Retina iOS 8 simulator
we should retest this later on Xcode 6 Gm using IOS 8 GM device.

Unable to reproduce this issue, tested with the following environment; 
iPhone 7 and Simulator (10.2) 
MacOS 10.11.6 (15G31) 
Studio 4.8.1.201612050850 
Ti SDK 6.0.2 GA 
Appc NPM 4.2.8 
Appc CLI 6.1.0 
Ti CLI 5.0.11 
Alloy 1.9.5 
Arrow 1.10.1 
Xcode 8.2 (8C38) 
Node v4.6.0 
Java 1.7.0_80
